data.title: Get the Premium Monthly Pass to VIP Webinar Series
data.meta_description: Don't miss this unique opportunity to gain insights from global thought leaders.
data.text:
To celebrate the European Chamber’s 20th anniversary, starting from May, we will host a ‘VIP Webinar Series’ with the world’s leading industry experts, scholars, political consultants and strategists, on a variety of topics including economy, politics, technology, sustainability, EU-China Relation and EU-China-US Triangle. This VIP webinar series aims to provide insights and discussions through interactive dialogues with the most brilliant minds around the globe.

Purchase the Premium Pass to get unlimited access to all VIP Webinars (in May) for free and priority to register.

Registrants who signed up after May 14 15:00 will enjoy a discounted price at CNY 500/1000 (member/non-member)!

Join the conversations with global thought leaders:

Phil Hogan, EU Commissioner for Trade

Virginijus Sinkevičius, EU Commissioner for Environment

Jyrki Katainen, Former Vice President of EU Commission and Prime Minister of Finland

Mikuláš Dzurinda, Former Prime Minister of Slovakia

Pascal Lamy, Former EU Commissioner for Trade and Director-General of WTO

Peter Mandelson, Chairman, Global Counsel; Former EU Trade Commissioner and First Secretary of State

Cecilia Malmström, Former EU Commissioner for Trade

Charlene Barshefsky, Former US Trade Representative

Ma Jun, Director, The Institute of Public & Environmental Affairs (IPE)

Zhu Ning, Professor and Deputy Dean, The National Institute of Financial Research (NIFR), Tsinghua University

VIP Webinars in May

6 May, 16:30 - 18:00

China Politics

Jian Zhang, associate professor of political science and assistant dean for external cooperation at the School of Government, Peking University

Mikko Huotari, Executive Director of MERICS

For more information, click here.

8 May, 15:30 - 17:00

EU-China

Phil Hogan, EU Commissioner for Trade

Jacob Wallenberg, Chairman Investor AB

Markus J. Beyrer, Director General BusinessEurope

For more information, click here.

13 May, 09:00 - 10:30

China Politics

David Hoffman, Senior Vice President. Asia Pacific, The Conference Board

Chris Johnson, Senior Fellow, Center for Strategic & International Studies; Ex CIA

For more information, click here.

14 May, 15:00 - 16:30

Chinese Economy

Bert Hofman, Director East Asian Institute, National University of Singapore, Professor in Practice Lee Kuan Yew School

Former head of the World Bank in China

Zhu Ning, Professor and Deputy Dean, The National Institute of Financial Research (NIFR), Tsinghua University, Author of <China’s Guaranteed Bubble>

Robin Zhu, Senior Analyst at Bernstein Asia Autos

For more information, click here.

15 May, 15:00 – 16:30

UK-China-Europe

George Magnus, Research Associate, China Center, Oxford University

Timothy Garton Ash, Oxford University

Peter Mandelson, Chairman, Global Counsel; Former EU Trade Commissioner and First Secretary of State

For more information, click here.

22 May, 16:00 – 17:30

Looking Back

Cecilia Malmström, Former EU Commissioner for Trade

Pascal Lamy, Former European Commissioner for Trade

Jürgen Hambrecht, Chairman of the Supervisory Board, BASF

For more information, click here.

26 May, 15:00 – 16:30

Green & Sustainability

Virginijus Sinkevičius, EU Commissioner for Environment

Isabel Hilton, CEO, China Dialogue

Ma Jun, Director, The Institute of Public & Environmental Affairs (IPE)

For more information, click here.

28 May, 19:00-20:30

US-China-Europe

Charlene Barshefsky, Former US Trade Representative

Mikuláš Dzurinda, Prime Minister of Slovakia (1998 to 2006). During his term Slovakia joined both the European Union and NATO

Jyrki Katainen, Former Vice President of EU Commission and Prime Minister of Finland (2011 to 2014)

For more information, click here.

The Premium Pass is non-refundable, don't miss any of our VIP Webinars!

How to Apply

1. Click 'register now', you'll be directed to the payment page, please contact myqiu@europeanchamber.com.cn in case you can't get access to payment details.

2. You'll be upgraded to premium pass holders once we receive your payment, please feel free to sign up for any upcoming VIP Webinar Series in May without extra charges.
